title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Authentic Assessment for Web-Based Language Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language leadership theory and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can execute language leadership communication strategies with 80% or higher accuracy via online forum discussions reflecting real-world work scenarios.
Learners achieve 75+ points (out of 100) in applying core language leadership concepts in online assessments (quizzes/scenario evaluations).
Learners can analyze their language leadership performance process in three or more granular stages using self- and peer-assessment systems.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
